name: diggers mine
description: Diggers Mine is a clicker game in which you will have to monitor oxygen, as well as click on ores and melt them in the oven.The main goal is to open all the ores and earn more XP than other players. How to play: First of all, 1 ore is coal, click on the coal and it will be mined.When there are more than 5 pieces of coal, click on the furnace and you have 5 coal calculated, but get 1 XP and fuel for the generator (works only with coal).When you have 50 XP, copper ore will open, it gives more XP but does not give fuel.When there is 100 XP, iron ore will open.When there is 200XP, gold ore will open.To refuel the oxygen generator, tap on it when you have 10 or more fuel. In general, everything, gain more XP than others and become the best, good luck miner!
